channel.title: OwenBeresford's very wordy site
channel.description: This is a technology site, detailing work I have done, and research for later work. I am a software engineer.

item.description: Discussion on my process of moving a maximum compatibility shell to more user focussed shell.

item.title: Alternative search engines
item.description: Article describes 18 less-popular alternative search-engine vendors with dedicated niche business plans, and takes a look at the UK's as a local example. Introduction covers the important features for search and recent history of this topic.

item.description: Some notes about hashtables, why and how

item.title: Symbol Tools
item.description: This analysis aims to find out if Fontawesome, currently used, should be replaced. Research on 7 font tools: Fontawesome, Iconspedia, Fontisto, Fontello, Icons8, Phosphor, and MaterialUI.

item.description: Commercial justification for using common engineering practice of OO. Please read if you are a business person.
